name: Session Tracker
description:
Window to track different stats in the current gaming session. Stats can be sPvP/WvW kills, kdr, deaths, currencies like karma and skirmish tickets and achievements like captured WvW towers and many more.
WARNING: The data is read from the GW2 API and is therefore delayed. Expect delays of at least 5 minutes. Even 30min and higher is possible.
The window is only visible in wvw by default. That can be changed in the settings.
